Reviews.Title: Not worth buying do not buy it.
Reviews.Author: Jose Angel Avendano Cv "Audible really make m...
Reviews.Content: The phone apparently has a problem of memory management capability is reset to 2-3 times daily, do not buy this product

Reviews.Title: A gud phone... except for the battery....
Reviews.Author: striker
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty decent midlevel smartphone with touch screen. Those who doesn't want to be in the iphone world... this is your best bet. Sufficient access to mails, facebook updates and Internet although not as good as the top class smart phones.Only problem I have is with the battery. The battery dies off in 24 hours. Not sure, if it's a problem with my piece. Bought a new battery. Still it doesn't go beyond a day. Apparently, I have to charge the phone whenever I get it home. The spec says that it has a talk time for 400 mins (provided you have additional two batteries with full charge)

Reviews.Title: htc smart phone
Reviews.Author: Cindy Raney "Craney"
Reviews.Content: This phone is a good world phone, but lacks a lot of features that the htc aria has. runs off of brows os and does not have the app store on it yet. other than that i find it to be a good phone.

Reviews.Title: piece of crap
Reviews.Author: b
Reviews.Content: this phone arrived on time i was so happy to recieve it but then soon as i started using it it turned out that it wouldnt open apps and it wouldnt even send or recieve pictures so i got rid of it and got an iphone and i recommend an  iphone for anyone! forget htc and this seller. i contacted them about the phone and they said they would charge me to take the phone back. thats so dumb. do NOT buy

Reviews.Title: Unsatisfied
Reviews.Author: Casey J. Lilly
Reviews.Content: The phone is pretty cool. Not as great when its unlocked. However, my complaint is that this company shipped the wrong product. I ordered the Pink HTC Smart. They sent the black one. If you are looking for a pink phone. Don't order from this company.

Talk time: Up to 370 minutes for WCDMA, Up to 450 minutes for GSM. Standby time: Up to 600 hours for WCDMA, Up to 450 hours for GSM
